name: Big Boys Moving & Storage - Tampa Movers
overview:
Big Boys Moving & Storage - BIG trucks, BIG movers, BIG savings! Currently under a statewide and national expansion coming soon to a town near you is family owned and operated right here in Tampa Bay with most of our business coming from the repeat and referral business of our already satisfied residential and commercial customers.

Big Boys Moving & Storage provides the experience and expertise of a large national moving company with the flexibility and personalized service of a local family owned business. With almost 30 years experience and only professional movers we provide the best possible service during each move. Voted “Best Movers” in Tampa Bay 2009, 2010, 2011 & 2012. Our references and resume place us as the moving industry leader.

Our trained team is reliable, careful and friendly. Our quality moving services are unmatched! When it comes to your personal property and prized possessions - Do not settle for less! Apartment, office, home or gym. Load or unload. Packing or unpacking. Dis-assembly and re-assembly. Big or small. In town or out. One item or a truckload. We also offer clean outs and removal, storage, packing supplies and emergency services.

Piano and antique experts and exclusive movers for local construction companies, real estate agencies, interior designers and apartment communities. At Big Boys & Storage Company “We treat your personal property as if it was our own! We are preferred “MacDill Movers” regularly referred by the Government and privatized organizations on MacDill Air Force Base. We have also been requested by professional agencies to complete moves for local athletes and celebrities.

We complete all size residential moves on a regular basis as well as large exclusive projects, recently completing the receiving, storage, unpacking, assembly and installation of 948 bedroom sets and 288 suites of living room and kitchen furniture for a USF off campus student dorm facility.

When local business and residents need professional movers to move in and out of Tampa Bay. They call the best. They call BIG BOYS MOVING & STORAGE COMPANY!

Moving Supplies: Boxes Carts & Dollies Dish Packs Forklifts General Equipment & Supplies Packing Supplies Padding & Quilts Padlocks Pallets Ropes Stretch-Wrap Tape Wardrobe Boxes

Service Areas: Local Long-Distance Regional

Move Types: Commercial & Office Moves Computer Moves Confidential Moves Display & Exhibit Moves Do-It-Yourself Moves Emergency & Short-Notice Employee Relocations Estate Moves Extra Large Load Moves Hi-Rise Moves Industrial Moves Intra-Office Mountain Home Moves Moving & Relocation - General Pianos Residential Moves Senior Moves Single-Piece Moves Small Load Moves Trade Show Moves
